{2}{G}, Sacrifice a land: Return this creature from your graveyard to your hand.

When this creature enters, reveal the top two cards of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.
Whenever another Elf enters, you may exile another Elf you control. If you do, create a 2/2 green and white Elf Knight creature token with vigilance.

[i]Chroma[/i] — Draw a card for each creature you control with power 4 or greater. Then creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of green mana symbols in the mana costs of cards in your graveyard.

Legendary creatures you control have vigilance.
Whenever one or more creatures enter the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, create a 2/2 white and green Avatar creature token with lifelink and vigilance.

When The Divine Gate enters, exile all nonland, non-Divine permanents.
Until The Divine Gate leaves the battlefield, players can't cast non-Divine spells.

cards.rules_text: Whenever you empower a Conjuration, you may sacrifice a creature.
